text: Ra Anumzamo'ma korapa'ma huno, e'ina hu'za hugahuema huno retroma hunte'nea zamo efore nehigeno, hugahuema huno'ma hu'nea nanekea eri rganere. Ana hu'neankino Jerusalemi kumamoka asunkura huoganteno, kazeri mopafi atre'ne. Ha' vaheka'a hankave nezamino, zmatrege'za e'za, hara eme hugagatere'naze. Ana nehu'za kagrama havizama hana zankura tusi musenkase hu'naze.
